0.text: Active: Morgana latches chains of energy onto nearby enemy champions over the cast time, dealing magic damage and forming a  tether between herself and each target for 3 seconds, during which the targets are  revealed and  slowed by 20%.
0.html: Active: Morgana latches chains of energy onto nearby enemy champions over the cast time, dealing magic damage and forming a tether between herself and each target for 3 seconds, during which the targets are revealed and slowed by 20%.

1.text: Morgana gains Â bonus movement speed while facing enemies tethered to her.
1.html: Morgana gains  bonus movement speed while facing enemies tethered to her.
markedPassages: bonus movement speed

2.text: If a target does not break their tether by the ends of its duration, they are dealt the same magic damage again and become  stunned for 1.5 seconds, during which they are  revealed.
2.html: If a target does not break their tether by the ends of its duration, they are dealt the same magic damage again and become stunned for 1.5 seconds, during which they are revealed.

Unique â Tribute: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges.
